title: Sets client access for album
name: Gives_access_to_the_Album
description: Gives access to the specific Album to the specific client Administrator, Photographer can give access

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 201 Created
 Location:  http://127.0.0.1/interPhoto/web/albums/66
    {
"album_id": "16",
"user_id": "40",
 "id": 3
    }

Error 4xx.description: 401 User needs to be autorized to action
403 User's not allowed to action

examples.title: Error-Response:
Error-Response:
examples.content:
403 Forbidden
{
   "name": "Forbidden",
   "message": "You are not allowed to perform this action.",
   "code": 0,
   "status": 403,
   "type": "yii\\web\\ForbiddenHttpException"
  }

title: Create new album
name: Create_Album
description: Creates a new album according users permissions. Administrator, Photographer can create album

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 201 Created
Location:  http://127.0.0.1/interPhoto/web/albums/66
   {
     "name": "Animals",
     "user_id": 39,
     "id": 66
    }

Error 4xx.description: 401 User needs to be autorized to action
403 User's not allowed to action

examples.title: Error-Response:
Error-Response:
examples.content:
403 Forbidden
{
   "name": "Forbidden",
   "message": "You are not allowed to perform this action.",
   "code": 0,
   "status": 403,
   "type": "yii\\web\\ForbiddenHttpException"
  }

title: Delete specific album
name: Delete_Album
description: Deletes the unique id album according users permissions. Only Administrator can delete any album. Photographer and client are not allowed to action.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content: HTTP/1.1 204 No content

Error 4xx.description: 401 User needs to be autorized to action
403 User's not allowed to action

examples.title: Error-Response:
Error-Response:
examples.content:
403 Forbidden
{
   "name": "Forbidden",
   "message": "You are not allowed to perform this action.",
   "code": 0,
   "status": 403,
   "type": "yii\\web\\ForbiddenHttpException"
  }

title: Index albums
name: Index_Albums
description: Returns the users' albums according users permissions. Administrator can get all albums. Photographer and client only their own (allowed) albums. If photographer or client doesn't have any own or allowed albums index will be empty.

Parameter.description: name of the album for filtering like ?name=Wedding

Error 4xx.description: 401 User needs to be autorized to action

examples.title: Error-Response:

title: Update specific album
name: Update_Album
description: Updates the unique id album according users permissions. Administrator can update any album. Photographer and client only their own (allowed) albums.

Error 4xx.description: 401 User needs to be autorized to action
403 User's not allowed to action

examples.title: Error-Response:

   "name": "Forbidden",
   "message": "You are not allowed to perform this action.",
   "code": 0,
   "status": 403,

  }

title: View specific album
name: View_Album
description: Returns the unique id album according users permissions. Administrator can view any album. Photographer and client only their own (allowed) albums.

Error 4xx.description: 401 User needs to be autorized to action
403 User's not allowed to action

examples.title: Error-Response:

title: Reset-code set and email
name: AskReset
description: For specific user as Email generates reset code and send it via email

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK

Connection →Keep-Alive
Content-Length →0
Content-Type →application/json; charset=UTF-8
Date →Mon, 02 May 2016 11:31:04 GMT
Keep-Alive →timeout=5, max=100
Server →Apache/2.4.7 (Ubuntu)
X-Powered-By →PHP/5.5.9-1ubuntu4.16

Error 4xx.description: Not found 404 User was not found, check the email
Bad request 400 Email is empty"

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
404 Not found
{
 "name": "User was not found, check the email",
 "message": "No such token",
 "code": 404,
 "status": 404,
 "type": "yii\\web\\NotFoundHttpException"
}

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
400 Bad request
{
 "name": "Bad Request",
 "message": "Email is  empty",
 "code": 400,
 "status": 400,
 "type": "yii\\web\\BadRequestHttpException"
}

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
400 Bad request
{
 "name": "Bad Request",
 "message": "Email with your reset code have been sent",
 "code": 400,
 "status": 400,
 "type": "yii\\web\\BadRequestHttpException"
}

title: The password reset
name: DoReset
description: Resets the password of user with specific email and reset code

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 201 Created

Connection →Keep-Alive
Content-Length →0
Content-Type →application/json; charset=UTF-8
Date →Mon, 02 May 2016 11:42:38 GMT
Keep-Alive →timeout=5, max=100
Server →Apache/2.4.7 (Ubuntu)
X-Powered-By →PHP/5.5.9-1ubuntu4.16

Error 4xx.description: Not found 404 User was not found, check the email
Bad request 400 Reset code has been used

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
404 Not found
{
 "name":  "Not Found",
 "message":  "User was not found, check the email",
 "code": 404,
 "status": 404,
 "type": "yii\\web\\NotFoundHttpException"
}

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
404 Not found
{
 "name":  "Not Found",
 "message":  "User was not found, check the reset code",
 "code": 404,
 "status": 404,
 "type": "yii\\web\\NotFoundHttpException"
}

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
400 Bad request
{
  "name": "Bad Request",
  "message": "Reset code has been used",
  "code": 400,
  "status": 400,
  "type": "yii\\web\\BadRequestHttpException"
}

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
400 Bad request
{
 name": "Bad Request",
 "message": "Email or(and) reset code or(and) password is (are) empty",
 "code": 400,
 "status": 400,
 "type": "yii\\web\\BadRequestHttpException"
}

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
400 Bad request
{
 name": "Bad Request",
 "message": "Email and reset code are dismatch each other",
 "code": 400,
 "status": 400,
 "type": "yii\\web\\BadRequestHttpException"
}

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
400 Bad request
{
 name": "Bad Request",
 "message": "Reset code is expired",
 "code": 400,
 "status": 400,
 "type": "yii\\web\\BadRequestHttpException"
}

title: Login
name: Login
description: Returns the access token for api

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK

Autorization →Bearer HP8h43Eb9LHJPUZAi3LKNcohZV9bQnN4
Connection →Keep-Alive
Content-Length →4
Content-Type →application/json; charset=UTF-8
Date →Mon, 02 May 2016 10:57:24 GMT
Keep-Alive →timeout=5, max=100
Server →Apache/2.4.7 (Ubuntu)
X-Powered-By →PHP/5.5.9-1ubuntu4.16

Error 4xx.description: found 404 User was not found, check the email or password
request 400 Email or(and) password is (are) empty

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
404 Not found
{
 "name": "Not Found",
 "message": "User was not found, check the email or password",
 "code": 404,
 "status": 404,
 "type": "yii\\web\\NotFoundHttpException"
}

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
400 Bad request
{
 "name": "Bad Request",
 "message": "Email or(and) password is (are) empty",
 "code": 400,
 "status": 400,
 "type": "yii\\web\\BadRequestHttpException"
}

title: Logout
name: Logout
description: Resets to empty the access token for api

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK

Connection →Keep-Alive
Content-Length →0
Content-Type →application/json; charset=UTF-8
Date →Mon, 02 May 2016 11:16:43 GMT
Keep-Alive →timeout=5, max=100
Server →Apache/2.4.7 (Ubuntu)
Www-Authenticate →Basic realm="api"
X-Powered-By →PHP/5.5.9-1ubuntu4.16

Error 4xx.description: Not found 404 No such token
Bad request 400 Incorrect token

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
404 Not found
{
 "name": "Not Found",
 "message": "No such token",
 "code": 404,
 "status": 404,
 "type": "yii\\web\\NotFoundHttpException"
}

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
400 Bad request
{
 "name": "Bad Request",
 "message": "Incorrect token",
 "code": 400,
 "status": 400,
 "type": "yii\\web\\BadRequestHttpException"
}

title: State of reset code
name: StateReset
description: Returns the state of reset code as headers Reset-Code-Used and Reset-Code-Valid-At

Success 200.description: 0 - has not been used yet, 1 - has been used
Date and time is valid for specific reset code

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK

Connection →Keep-Alive
Content-Type →application/json; charset=UTF-8
Date →Mon, 02 May 2016 12:25:45 GMT
Keep-Alive →timeout=5, max=100
Reset-Code-Used →0
Reset-Code-Valid-At →2016-05-01 22:11:26
Server →Apache/2.4.7 (Ubuntu)
X-Powered-By →PHP/5.5.9-1ubuntu4.16

Error 4xx.description: Not found 404
Bad request 400 Reset code has been used

title: Create  image in the specific album
name: Create_Image
description: Creates image in the specific album according users permissions. Administrator can create any image of any album. Photographer can create image in their own albums. Client doesn't have permission to creat image.

Parameter.description: File of image to upload jpg, png

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content: HTTP/1.1 200 OK

Error 4xx.description: 401 User needs to be autorized to action
403 User's not allowed to action

examples.title: Error-Response:
Error-Response:
examples.content:
403 Forbidden
{
   "name": "Forbidden",
   "message": "You are not allowed to perform this action.",
   "code": 0,
   "status": 403,
   "type": "yii\\web\\ForbiddenHttpException"
  }

title: Delete specific image in the specific album
name: Delete_Image
description: Delets the unique id image in the specific album according users permissions. Administrator can delete any image of any album. Photographer can delete image only of their own (allowed) albums.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content: HTTP/1.1 204 No content

Error 4xx.description: 401 User needs to be autorized to action
403 User's not allowed to action

examples.title: Error-Response:
Error-Response:
examples.content:
403 Forbidden
{
   "name": "Forbidden",
   "message": "You are not allowed to perform this action.",
   "code": 0,
   "status": 403,
   "type": "yii\\web\\ForbiddenHttpException"
  }

title: Index  image of the specific album
name: Index_Image
description: Returns the list if images of the specific album according users permissions. Administrator can index any image of any album. Photographer and client can index image only of their own (allowed) albums.

Parameter.description: You can check of the resizing image state. Just type ?status-=complete ot status=new. The status=complete means that images was resized

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
      [
{
  "id": 11,
  "album_id": 16,
  "image": "users_cache.png",
  "created_at": 1462993051
},
{
  "id": 15,
  "album_id": 16,
  "image": "users_cache.png",
  "created_at": 1462994046
},

title: Update image
description: Action is not allowed. To update photo you should delete the photo and create new one.
name: Update_Image

Error 4xx.description: 405 Method is not allowed

title: View specific image of the specific album
name: View_Image
description: Returns the unique id image of the specific album according users permissions. Administrator can view any image of any album. Photographer and client can view image only of their own (allowed) albums. Photographer gives access to his own albums to the client.
